FuncDef: This command enables authentication and specifies the type of authentication to be used on the OSPF interface.

ParaDef.Info: This keyword enables simple password (plain text) authentication. If authentication is enabled and no authentication type is specified in the command, simple password authentication is enabled.
This keyword enables message digest MD5 authentication in accordance with RFC1321. If this option is configured, then at least one message-digest-key must be configured.
